# MTLShaderValidation.enabled

**Case**

Enables shader validation.

## Declaration

```swift
case enabled
```

## Validation states

- **MTLShaderValidation.default**: The default value when the property isn’t set.
- **MTLShaderValidation.disabled**: Disables shader validation.

items.description: The default value when the property isn’t set.
